description:
Reinforced concrete theory for flexure, shear, compression; strength & serviceability limit states; slabs - lower bound analysis. Strength & deformation properties; material selection; mix design & specification; durability; code requirements; case studies; laboratory; practicals. 
 [Students will be required to provide their own PPE (safety glasses and steel cap boots) and possess a current "General Safety Induction Course - Construction Industry" site card or similar recognised under Queensland legislation.]
